name: K+K Palais Hotel

reviews.text: Stayed one night in late June. Took an executive room that was spacious, quiet and very comfortable. Nice view of square outside. Shower / toilet area a little small but clean, modern and everything worked fine. Breakfast was excellent.
reviews.title: Great stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Location is very good - 5/10 minutes to the centre of the 'innere Stadt', also close to subway.
reviews.title: Quite disappointed

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Service was very good from all employees I met.
reviews.title: Fantastic hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Thoroughly recommend this place - as good as the Maria Theresia if not better, and that's saying something. Very good value for money too.
reviews.title: Quiet and simple
Another great K+K hotel
reviews.text: My husband and I stayed at 4 different hotels during our time in Austria and unfortunately this was our least favourite and the most disappointing. Perhaps our expectations were too high after staying in such gorgeous places as the Seehotel Frieberg at Zell am See and the Hotel Sacher in Salzburg but we certainly expected more for our money.

The hotel is conveniently situated close to the old town and also to the U-Bahn station. It is only 10-12 minutes walk to the Hofburg/Stephansdom. The room was clean and air conditioned (not in all similar hotels of Vienna) and the bed comfortable, unfortunately the room was little bit small, but with free wifi (Super!!!).
reviews.title: central location, five star service

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Breakfast was perfect.The staff were all friendly, helpful, and keen to assist.
reviews.title: Peace in Vienna

reviews.text: All together i highly recommended and I stay here again.
reviews.title: Beautiful and Modern

reviews.text: We chose this partly because of its quiet location, and asked for a quiet room, which we got, overlooking a courtyard at the rear. 10 to 15 minutes walk to the city centre, close to the canal and underground, the situation was excellent.
reviews.title: Lovely Hotel in Vienna

reviews.text: The staff were all very friendly and helpful, breakfasts were perfectly adequate, and our room was very good and comfortable.
reviews.title: Our oasis in Vienna!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We chose this hotel due to the good reviews we read in Tripadvisor and confirmed that it is indeed an excellent place to stay right in the centre of Vienna, but in a quiet, nice area within walking distance from the cathedral, and pedestrian streets. The attitude of the personnel in the reception area was warm and welcoming, and service, food quality and installations during breakfast were also very good.
reviews.title: Excellent boutique hotel in Vienna

reviews.text: We asked for a room overlooking the park and the Belvedere package which were both very good options. The package included also the Vienna card so we were able to move around in public trams to all the museums. It was a delightful experience!
reviews.title: Super hotel near to Centre

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We'd read the reviews for this hotel on trip advisor so decided to try for a 3 night stay. We certainly were not disappointed. The hotel is lovely in a very quiet square, but the main centre is near enough to be within walking distance. A direct bus from the airport stops at Morzinplatz about 200 metres from the hotel.
reviews.title: Quite inner city location close to St Peter's

reviews.text: Staff were really friendly and helpful, and all speak excellent English. The Continental breakfast has a large choice, rooms were clean and good sized, comfortable beds and pillows, and the en suite had a large walk in shower.
reviews.title: Good location, good breakfast

reviews.text: We’ll be using this hotel again returning and would definitely recommend it
reviews.title: Excellent hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My wife and I stayed at the K+K Palais at the end of April. The hotel is perfectly situated in a quiet square but within easy walking distance of the centre of Vienna and also close to the Schottenring U-bahn station which is on U4. The room was not large, but scrupulously clean, with a good bathroom and excellent walk-in shower. Reception is helpful and friendly, and everyone speaks excellent English. Gluten-free bread at breakfast was provided without any fuss, and the breakfast itself is excellent: a wide range of fruit, cold meats and so on, and excellent scrambled eggs, bacon and sausages.
reviews.title: K+K Palais and Vienna: both five star: S+SF

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: An easy walk (necessary, as it was 25 degrees every day - gorgeous weather) takes you to the Cathedral in about five minutes, and the U4 line takes you to the Schonnberg Palace. The location of this hotel could not be better, and in the five nights we spent there we really could not fault the hotel in any way.
reviews.title: Nice Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: There are plenty of eating places towards the Cathedral and beyond, and it is also quite easy to walk to the Naschmarkt, where you are spoilt for choice (even quicker on the U-bahn). This is an excellent hotel at an affordable price.
reviews.title: Affordable luxury!

reviews.text: We stayed in April for 3 nights and upgraded to an executive room. Although the room was very clean and the bed comfortable, the room was small and very sparse so I am not sure it was worth upgrading (my only negative). Great location which enabled us to walk everywhere and it was very quiet. Staff very friendly and helpful and breakfast was good.
reviews.title: Very Nice Experience

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: K K Palais is a beautifully modernised old building on a quiet square. The staff are friendly, knowledgeable, helpful and speak fluent English. Our ensuite with shower-rooms was excellent, clean and well kept. The dining room is immaculate and the continental breakfast as filling as you want it to be! For dinner in the evening, there is a wide choice of dining within easy reach. The hotel is conveniently situated close to Morzinplatz airport bus terminal and Schottentor U-bahn, which is just 2 stops from Wien Mitte, the main railway station and City Airport Train (CAT) terminus. It is also only 10 minutes walk to the Stephansdom and most of the tourist attractions are in easy walking distance from there. We found that the maps suggest distances are greater than they turned out to be! If/when we return to Vienna we would certainly try to book K K Palais Hotel. Highly recommended.
reviews.title: Faultless and superb care

description: Behind an elegant old facade lies this hotel of great sophistication and modern luxury a historical building once belonging to the imperial family. As all K + K Hotels it offers state-of-the-art amenities elegantly furnished rooms and the personal service of highly trained and motivated staff. Its quiet location in the Vienna city center and its close proximity to St. Stephens Cathedral to the pedestrian area and underground stations make it particularly attractive. Free WiFi in all guest rooms and public area. Free access to the Internet Lounge (PCs, printer and international newspapers). Complimentary coffee and tea making facilities in the rooms.
